reviews.sentence: Average Stay. My stay with this property was average Service was good and staff was also cordial but the food quality was below average and i would rate it as 3 star Property.

Happy stay on a Business trip. I could suggest Ginger is a quite good hotel in an affordable cost and for a pleasant stay. It is a cool hotel with Wifi Room service Gymnasium cafe and canteen services etc. The staff is really good especially House keeping and Canteen services. Room ambience is excellent. Interestingly i would like to highlight a few asociatesstaf in Ginger hotel aswel. A House keeping associate named PAPA RAO and his supervisor Parthiv Patil are very good people. Why would i telling those people are very good because the way they respects wishing customers and their dedication towards work is really appreciative. I would like to highlight the room cleaning services simply superb. Apart from that canteen services also good. May not be many items but is providing enough items. As i am vegetarian i am not sure on non veg items but veg items are delicious. Not much noise i felt. so that i had a very good and pleasant stay here.

Well located place with reason. While the place is located in a central location like all ginger hotels the maintenance of the hotel was spotty with a musty smell on most items. The WiFi does not work most of the time. The rates are reasonable if you book through an online portal. The property looks old and the wear and tear is very evident.
Awesome place to stay at an affordable rate.

A peaceful stay clean rooms complete privacy. Room are good. Staff are very friendly and professional. Only thing is to improve is it is food. it is good but not up to mark in term of taste and huge amount of single person. it is a decent stay just l This hotel looks grand from outside but the rooms looks kind of old but they Are good and well maintained. They are good but looking at the price which I got from a booking site I Will consider it a extremely budget hotel with all facilities provided.

Very good hotel at reasonable price. Room was very good and holel was very near to my work location just 2 min walk. All staff in hotel was very good. If I visit Bhubaneswar again I will stay in Ginger hotel only. Perfect hotel for Swach Bharat Abbey and will contribute in making Bhubneswar No 1 Smart city in India.

it is located at a nice. Good choice at a great price. If you visit better to stay here. MT offers great price for this premium hotel. All facilities available at the hotel though little higher price. Arrangements for vehicle parking is there.

Overall good experience. This. This was my second stay at this hotel. Centre location good staff. The overall experience was good. I would definitely recommend it to anyone in this price range. Worth price. Food is good with inside cafe.

Its ok as a last resort for the price it charges. Any good hotel u will get with 10x better service. Its a typical govt. service which happens at its own pace. Qty of dishes quite less. Basic amenities like water is difficult to get. Except reception no one responds easily.

it is not a good experience. I am staying in this Hotel for more than 15 yrs I E since when the room charges were Rs 110 0 night. The maintenance and hospitality used to be the best. Gradually things changed moreover after construction of new building the lenin stinky towels unhygenic toilets. mosquitoes etc are worst. Being a regular visitor it is painful to me more importantly for TATA Group. Also feel sorry to write against the present Administration.

Plus Points1God hospitality2. Check in time was 2 PM but they allowed at 1 PM3. Restaurant n Gym is there1Roms are really Small. Rooms are ok but not good for family having 2 adults n 1 kid2. No Sofa this time. However on request they provided additional chairs 3. AC makes noise4. Restaurant food is costly compared to what available in nearby restaurants.

We had booked one room for three adults and hotel accepted that and charged accordingly. However when we checked in we saw rooms are too small to accommodate three adults and on top of it they gave extra mattress without cot and there was no place to keep extra mattress. When you do not have space to accommodate three adults in single room why do you accept during booking. Very unpleasant experience for us. Will never recommend ginger hotel to anyone.

Rooms are good but do not expect much toilets are not upto the mark which they charge for a room. Restraunts are good tasty food was served even the breakfast buffet was very good and we had a lot of options.
Rooms are small and old but clean. Absolutely not worth the money you pay. Service can be improved. Location is its advantage.

1 night stay at Ginger. Hotel is located in a good locality for business class. do not expect any person to welcome you or take your luggage. Its like help your self. do not believe the laundry amount mentioned on the in room laundry tariff. You will end up paying double the amount including GST plus unexplained service tax. Room size is good. Expect some noise and construction work every where. Renovation is going on. Play with them.
They charge 450 l7nch food was grate.

Hotel is good with services. Reception staff is very cooperative help full. Though food is costly which needs to be looked into reviewed. Overall excellent place to stay. Location of the hotel is superb.
You must aware before booking those who extract money in way of excluding breakfast limited channels in TV there is a fecility but they want charge extra.

Good hotel. The hotel is good in terms of location and cleanliness. The rooms are not worth the amount being charged. The restaurant and food are OK but the food is very costly. The rooms are not worth.

Poor accommodation facilities. Hey guys this is my second visit to Ginger and the room was as worst as the first visit. I did drop an oral complaint with the manager director of Ginger. His name is Mr Panda and put a helpless face even the second time when I brought his attention to the quality of the room. I asked him for a refund he shrugged off by offering me dinner. I politely denied. Please do pay attention to customer satisfaction when you charge so high prices for limited facilities. Best regards Lokesh Maragani.
